snippet: Cuba’s president, Raúl Castro, has announced the removal of the former Parliament chief Ricardo Alarcón and several other leaders from the Communist Party’s Central Committee.
abstract: Cuba’s Pres Raul Castro announces removal of former Parliament chief Ricardo Alarcon and several other leaders from Communist Party’s Central Committee.
lead_paragraph: Cuba’s president, Raúl Castro, has announced the removal of the former Parliament chief Ricardo Alarcón and several other leaders from the Communist Party’s Central Committee.
